title: Rs. 6 Billion worth cocaine seized by Customs
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Customs seized 350 kg of Cocaine concealed inside a freight container that was destined to India from Panama.
Sri Lanka Customs said the Cocaine was valued at Rs. 6,000 Million and was concealed inside a cargo container filled with discarded steel.
